list_definition.definition: to settle firmly in a position (eg a job, business etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He established himself (in business) as a jeweller.

list_definition.definition: to found; to set up (eg a university, a business)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: How long has the firm been established?

list_definition.definition: to show to be true; to prove

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The police established that he was guilty.
